Course Description: HIS COURSE PRESENTS THE ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES AND CONCEPTS APPLICABLE FOR PURCHASES, SALES, INVENTORY, PREPAID EXPENSES, PLANT ASSETS AND ACCOUNTING FOR SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP, PARTNERSHIP, AND CORPORATIONS.  ACCRUAL METHOD ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES ARE DISCUSSED WITH END-OF-YEAR PROCEDURE AND THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major: MAJOR COURSE TOPICS INCLUDE AN OVERVIEW: RECEIVABLES, FIXED AND INTANGIBLE ASSETS, CURRENT LIABILITIES INCLUDING PAYROLL, CORPORATE AND PARTNERSHIP TRANSACTIONS, STATEMENT OF CASH FLOW, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT ANALYSIS
Textbook(s):
FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING 10TH EDITION
CENGAGE LEARNING
WARREN, REEVE AND DUCHAC
10: 0324380674
